abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: A bash that deals light damage and asserts dominance.

abilities.name: Guardian Stance
abilities.description: Bailey focuses on protecting the team, boosting her defenses.

abilities.name: Body Block
abilities.description: Bailey takes the brunt of attacks aimed at an ally.

abilities.name: Crushing Counter
abilities.description: A devastating counterstrike delivered after holding the line.

abilities.name: Taunting Bark
abilities.description: Bino's obnoxious barking rattles the enemy’s nerves.

abilities.name: Dirty Trick
abilities.description: A cheap shot while the ref isn't looking.

abilities.name: Ego Boost
abilities.description: Bino hypes himself up, convinced he's the best fighter in the league.

abilities.name: Come At Me, Loser!
abilities.description: If the next attack against Bino misses, he immediately counterattacks.

abilities.name: Radiant Blast
abilities.description: A burst of radiant energy that scorches the foe.

abilities.name: Gentle Light
abilities.description: A calm, soothing glow that heals wounds.

abilities.name: Protective Aura
abilities.description: A soft aura strengthens the team's defenses.

abilities.name: Soul Flare
abilities.description: Breel focuses deep spiritual power into a devastating flare.

abilities.name: Commanding Blow
abilities.description: A disciplined strike that shows K9 training.

abilities.name: K9 Drill
abilities.description: A practiced combination attack.

abilities.name: Rally the Troops
abilities.description: Fido's leadership inspires the whole team.

abilities.name: Justice Strike
abilities.description: A punishing blow delivered in the name of justice.

abilities.name: Quick Slash
abilities.description: A fast slash that keeps Fox constantly on the offensive.

abilities.name: Flanking Strike
abilities.description: A precise attack from the side or rear of the enemy.

abilities.name: Dash In
abilities.description: Fox rushes into an advantageous position, boosting his speed.

abilities.name: Finishing Blow
abilities.description: A powerful strike aimed to end the fight.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Grape springs onto the target with feline grace.

abilities.name: Flurry of Swipes
abilities.description: A rapid series of claw strikes.

abilities.name: Pridelands Pose
abilities.description: Grape channels her inner warrior, improving her combat focus.

abilities.name: Predator's Rush
abilities.description: A full-speed charge that slams into the opponent.

abilities.name: Magic Trick
abilities.description: A flashy bolt of magic that Joey fires off with a grin.

abilities.name: Mystic Guard
abilities.description: A shimmering ward that protects an ally from harm.

abilities.name: Supportive Cheer
abilities.description: Joey's enthusiastic cheer sharpens an ally's focus.

abilities.name: Starfall Burst
abilities.description: Joey calls down a concentrated shower of arcane stars on 2 foes.

abilities.name: Misdirection
abilities.description: Karishad confuses the target, reducing their accuracy.

abilities.name: Slapstick Strike
abilities.description: A goofy strike that throws the target off-balance.

abilities.name: Trickster Spin
abilities.description: A spiraling swipe that’s hard to predict.

abilities.name: Prankster Burst
abilities.description: A chaotic morale boost that sharpens reflexes.

abilities.name: Sneaky Swipe
abilities.description: A quick swipe when the enemy isn't looking.

abilities.name: Insider Trading
abilities.description: Keene manipulates the battlefield economy to rattle the opponent.

abilities.name: Milton Foundation Bribe
abilities.description: Keene calls in a timely donation to avoid the next attack that hits him.

abilities.name: Opportunistic Strike
abilities.description: Hits harder if the enemy is debuffed or off-balance.

abilities.name: Power Pose
abilities.description: Kevin pumps himself up, increasing raw strength.

abilities.name: Training Strike
abilities.description: A measured strike born of constant workouts.

abilities.name: Bulldog Charge
abilities.description: Kevin barrels into the enemy with full force.

abilities.name: Iron Will
abilities.description: Kevin’s focus hardens, boosting defenses briefly.

abilities.name: Guarded Strike
abilities.description: A cautious blow that keeps King ready to defend.

abilities.name: Clumsy Swing
abilities.description: A heavier attack that hits surprisingly hard when it connects.

abilities.name: Dogged Resolve
abilities.description: King steels himself, boosting his defenses for a short time.

abilities.name: Last-Minute Luck
abilities.description: A desperate attack that relies on King's luck to land a big hit.

abilities.name: Feint Sting
abilities.description: A misleading jab that throws off the enemy’s timing.

abilities.name: Sly Suggestion
abilities.description: Lana manipulates the foe's focus with smooth words.

abilities.name: Agile Flip
abilities.description: A swift flip that boosts Lana's speed.

abilities.name: Milton Finisher
abilities.description: A stylish and surprisingly forceful strike.

abilities.name: Guardian Howl
abilities.description: Lucretia’s steady howl strengthens allies’ resolve.

abilities.name: Stand Firm
abilities.description: Lucretia braces her posture, greatly boosting defense.

abilities.name: Shielding Paw
abilities.description: Lucretia intercepts blows aimed at a teammate.

abilities.name: Resolute Strike
abilities.description: A calm, confident blow delivered with perfect timing.

abilities.name: Clumsy Swipe
abilities.description: A clumsy attack that occasionally lands well.

abilities.name: Supportive Yowl
abilities.description: A loud meow that somehow helps allies focus.

abilities.name: Bandage Up
abilities.description: A bit of basic first aid that goes a long way.

abilities.name: Accidental Help
abilities.description: Marvin stumbles into the right place, providing a lucky break.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Maxwell melts into the shadows, becoming harder to hit and much quicker.

abilities.name: Distracting Flurry
abilities.description: A fast series of feints that confuses the enemy and opens a window for Grape.

abilities.name: Tricky Slash
abilities.description: A precise cut that exploits tiny openings.

abilities.name: Disappearing Act
abilities.description: Maxwell slips away in a swirl of motion, causing the next attack aimed at him to miss completely.

abilities.name: Shield Slam
abilities.description: A heavy slam that briefly slows the enemy.

abilities.name: Unbreakable
abilities.description: Mungo braces with overwhelming strength.

abilities.name: Guard Duty
abilities.description: Mungo protects a teammate with sheer body mass.

abilities.name: Groundbreaker
abilities.description: Mungo slams the ground, shaking everything nearby.

abilities.name: Chill Wind
abilities.description: A cold gust that chills the target and slows them.

abilities.name: Arcane Barrier
abilities.description: Natalie conjures a magical barrier shielding allies.

abilities.name: Mystic Focus
abilities.description: A moment of concentration amplifies her spell power.

abilities.name: Spectral Lance
abilities.description: A piercing spectral projectile aimed with precision.

abilities.name: Tail Wag
abilities.description: Peanut's enthusiasm cheers up the entire team.

abilities.name: Pridelands Inspiration
abilities.description: Peanut quotes Pridelands, inspiring allies to fight harder.

abilities.name: Book Bonk
abilities.description: A bonk with a hefty book. Educational and painful.

abilities.name: Hearty Encouragement
abilities.description: A heartfelt pep talk that restores an ally's strength.

abilities.name: Shoulder Check
abilities.description: A solid shoulder slam that knocks enemies around.

abilities.name: Bark Orders
abilities.description: Ralph barks out commands, improving the team's discipline.

abilities.name: Hold the Line
abilities.description: Ralph digs in, becoming very hard to move.

abilities.name: Full-Stop Tackle
abilities.description: A high-impact takedown that stops the target cold.

abilities.name: Shadow Bolt
abilities.description: A bolt of shadowy energy fired with precision.

abilities.name: Dark Mist
abilities.description: A dark fog reduces accuracy of all enemies.

abilities.name: Focus Chant
abilities.description: A calm chant that empowers spellcasting allies.

abilities.name: Astral Spear
abilities.description: A piercing astral strike launched at high velocity.

abilities.name: Cheer Up!
abilities.description: Sasha cheers an ally, raising their spirits and a key stat.

abilities.name: Playful Smack
abilities.description: A light, silly hit that still stings a bit.

abilities.name: Healing Hug
abilities.description: A comforting hug that restores an ally's vitality.

abilities.name: Lucky Charm
abilities.description: Sasha spreads her good luck to the team.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: A focused bolt of arcane energy.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: A minor curse that weakens the target's defenses.

abilities.name: Future Sight
abilities.description: Tarot glimpses possible futures, improving her team's reactions.

abilities.name: Meteor Burst
abilities.description: A psychic meteor slams into the enemy team in a burst of energy.

abilities.name: Warning Shot
abilities.description: A controlled strike meant to keep foes at bay.

abilities.name: K9 Focus
abilities.description: Terrace sharpens her senses, increasing her strike accuracy.

abilities.name: Concussive Hit
abilities.description: A powerful strike that leaves enemies rattled.

abilities.name: K9 Finisher
abilities.description: A decisive takedown blow used at the end of K9 drills.

abilities.name: Wild Swing
abilities.description: Tiger swings wildly, sometimes hitting multiple enemies.

abilities.name: Snack Break
abilities.description: Tiger pauses for a snack, regaining health.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: Tiger flies into a rage, hitting harder but dropping his guard.

abilities.name: Meat Meteor
abilities.description: Tiger hurls himself (and maybe a snack) at the enemy team.
